content: the camille cardi is a super easy pattern using just one main stitch the double_crochet even the most novice of crocheters can complete this cardigan available in nine sizes ranging from xs - 5xl finished bust measurement 34 5 39 43 48 5 52 5 56 5 59 5 63 5 67 5 for this design we are using a size 3/dk weight yarn with two crochet hooks the i/5 5mm to start and the h/5mm to make the majority of the design
